column4: I just installed ubuntu on my laptop. How would i get it connected to the internet by a 2wire homeportal router?
used windows before? if so, what was your IP there?
I don't remember my ip from before.
lspci -vv. tell me the full PCI ID 1234:0843
sorry... not sure what that means...
sorry looked like a w not vv on my screen
lspci -vv. paste the output in a pastebin
: where am I supposed to put lspci -w? I'm a complete linux noob.
lspci -vv
Do I type that in the terminal on my ubuntu?
yes
Says invalid option and a list of commands
lspci -vv
bash: lspci-w: command not found that is what it says
a) I epxlicitly told you 2 v's. NO w. I also had a space between lspci and the -
Okay now there is a bunch of stuff on the screen, what should i look for/
paste it
in a pastebin
what is a pastebin?
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/26546/plain/ there is what was on the screen
there is nothing by rich...
*ricoh
whats ricoh?
do you use PPPOE? what is your IP when in windows?
